overview.title: Checkbox Component
overview.description: Checkboxes let users select one or more options from a list. They represent a boolean state.

html.title: HTML
html.code: <input type=\"checkbox\" id=\"terms\"><label for=\"terms\">I agree to the terms</label>

css.title: CSS
css.code: /* See component style.css for the full reference styles. */

js.title: JavaScript
js.description: JavaScript can listen for change events to sync the value with application state.

best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Associate labels with inputs using for and id for a larger tap target.
Provide a clear, visible focus style for keyboard users.
Group related checkboxes in a fieldset with a legend.
Avoid using checkboxes for mutually exclusive choices; use radio buttons.
Ensure the checked state is conveyed with more than just color.

questions.question: How do you properly associate a text label with a checkbox for accessibility and larger click target?
answers: Match label for to input id
Wrap the label in a div
Place the label after the checkbox
questions.answer: Match label for to input id
